name: Men's Hair Club Reversed Reversed Reversed Reversed
name_original: Men's Hair Club Reversed Reversed Reversed Reversed
description:
I really liked the MHC reversed entry for Mego's Character Contest, so to show my gratitude I reversed it.

Mostly a showcase of the animations they had but as enemies.

Game is 99% buggy

Original Men's Hair Club reversed:
Gilligan - Animations, Coding
cannedbeans29 - Spritework, Ideas
Pointless SOTWS - Trimmer sprite

Men's Hair Club reversed reversed:
AAA - Animations, Coding, Spritework
Liam - A lot of scripting help

also I forgot to mention, but the Hair Spray misc sprite was taken from Timeless:
